body: Wait, he let his wife fuck another man and let him breed her and took care of her baby with another man?

@MeAndTheBoy It didn't change your view on marriage? Like whether its just a piece of paper to share taxes or a lifelong sickness and health commitment? (If your biological parents weren't married that's another story altogether, then nvm)
@Euphorism I was 8... pretty sure that's pretty young.
Yo, tf is up with that hand? Lol

@MeAndTheBoy nah I’m talking about like children, they grow up watching thier parents and if their parents are not happy then they would not want to get married or be in relationship...etc It can be pretty shocking to them. If it was my mom i’d be happy for her if its my dad i’d be pissed lol

@Euphorism I saw my mom bang my step-dad (back then still boyfriend) and it doesn't feel anything... my father cheat on her first. He even treated me the same or better. Is when you ignore the retard story that's when you might be traumatizing. Let be honest, your mom can fuck anyone she like and you properly wouldn't care unless you are one of those who want to fuck your own mom. And if she considered cheatimg while your dad is faithful then she properly don't love you anyway.
Sad cuckhold, these guys should not breed tf
yup yup i hope your kids dont catch you cheating cause that would be the most traumatizing thing in their lives.
